abstract: Robert L. Nardelli, the former chief executive of Home Depot, had to quit the Business Roundtable, which is only for sitting chief executives.
snippet: Robert L. Nardelli, the former chief executive of Home Depot, had to quit the Business Roundtable, which is only for sitting chief executives.
lead_paragraph: On the very same day that he left Home Depot last week with an exit package worth at least $210 million, Robert L. Nardelli walked away from another prominent position — without a cent.

headline.main: He’s Not Out of Cash, but Is Out of the Club
headline.print_headline: He’s Not Out of Cash, But Is Out of the Club
